\begingroup

\resetlayout

\def\notes{\vnotes3}%semiquavers
\def\Notes{\vnotes4}%quavers
\def\NOtes{\vnotes5}%crotchets
\def\NOTes{\vnotes6}%minims
\def\NOTEs{\vnotes7}%dotminims
\def\NOTES{\vnotes8}%semibreves

\setclef1{\treble}
\smallmusicsize
\belowsystem{8}
\generalsignature{-1}
\generalmeter{\meterfrac32}
\startpiece

\bar
\NOTes\ha{g}\en
\NOTes\ha{f}\en
\NOtes\qa{'a}\en

\bar

\bar
